actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit a certain requirement from applying to out-of-State municipal solid waste generated and disposed of within the same bi-State level A metropolitan statistical area.

summary.text: Bi-State Waste Disposal Efficiency Act - Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide that any requirement in a Federal law that an owner or operator of a landfill or incinerator obtain authorization to receive out-of-State municipal solid waste shall not apply if the out-of-State waste is generated within, and the landfill or incinerator is located within, the same bi-State level A metropolitan statistical area which contains two contiguous major cities located in different States.

titles.title: To amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to prohibit a certain requirement from applying to out-of-State municipal solid waste generated and disposed of within the same bi-State level A metropolitan statistical area.
